description: Stores data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76049-SOFT TISSUE: Biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Tumor Size.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: SPECIFIC_MARGINS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specific Margins.

columns.name: TREATMENT_EFFECT_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Treatment Effect.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


No prior treatment


Not applicable


Present


No definite response identified (grade 3, poor/no response; extensive residual tumor)


No definite response identified (grade 3, poor or no response)


Greater than 10% residual viable tumor


Less than 10% residual viable tumor


Greater than 50% residual viable tumor


Less than 50% residual viable tumor


No definite or minimal response identified (poor or no response)


Marked response (minimal residual cancer)


No known presurgical therapy


No definite response to presurgical therapy


Probable or definite response to presurgical therapy


Cannot be determined


Indeterminate


Not known

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: HISTOLOGIC_GRADE_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not applicable


GX: Cannot be assessed


G1: Well differentiated


G2: Moderately differentiated


G3: Poorly differentiated


G4: Undifferentiated


G4: Undifferentiated / anaplastic


WHO grade not assigned


Low-grade (well-differentiated to moderately differentiated)


High-grade (poorly differentiated to undifferentiated)


FIGO Grade 1


FIGO Grade 2


FIGO Grade 3


Favorable (purely epithelial, fetal subtype, mitotically inactive with <=2 mitoses in


Less favorable (all subtypes other than those designated "Favorable" or "Unfavorable"


Unfavorable (small cell undifferentiated or rhabdoid as the predominant or sole histo


Gleason Pattern


Ungraded sarcoma


pGX: Grade cannot be assessed


pG1: Spindle cell melanoma


pG2: Mixed cell melanoma


pG3: Epithelioid cell melanoma


WHO Grade I


WHO Grade II


WHO Grade III


WHO Grade IV


pG1: Well differentiated


pG2: Moderately differentiated


pG3: Poorly differentiated


pG4: Undifferentiated


FNCLCC Grade 1


FNCLCC Grade 2


FNCLCC Grade 3


Grade 1


Grade 2


Grade 3


Cannot be determined


Other

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Other Close Margins Specify.

columns.name: MITOTIC_RATE
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Mitotic Rate.

columns.name: NECROSIS_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Necrosis.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not identified


Present


Present, focal (small foci or single cell necrosis)


Present, central (expansive "comedo" necrosis)


Not applicable


Cannot be determined

columns.name: NECROSIS_EXTENT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Necrosis Extent.

columns.name: IMMUNOHISTOCHEM_C_NAME
columns.description:
CAP synoptic form item: Immunohistochemistry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Specify


Performed, see separate report


Performed


Not performed

columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify immunohistochemistry.
